casebody.data:
No. 11-227. Syrian Arab Republic, Petitioner v. Francis Gates, Individually and as Administrator of the Estate of Olin Eugene “Jack” Armstrong, Jr., et al. 565 U.S. 945, 132 S. Ct. 422,

181 L. Ed. 2d 261,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 7352. October 11, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.

Same case below, 396 U.S. App. D.C. 128, 646 F.3d 1.
